trends: There has been one other sighting in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around December 21st 1991
divs: Sighting DetailsI had taken my then girlfriend out to the movie's to see a Christmas vacation by national lampoon, we left the movie and made it back to her place, as I stood on waiting for her to find her keys I saw an object on my right that was a dull orange in color and was a single point of light, then separated into 5 points of light that flew in a v formation then clustered close together and flew away at a very rapid speed untill I couldn't see it anymore, all of this took place in less than 10 minutes. As it was flying away she turned and saw it and asked what it was and I told her I didn't know, that's my full account of what I saw now can somebody tell me what I saw please?....
Summary: one single point of light flying at a nice pace then broke into five points then in to a V shape before clustering.
